GSD.description:
tty: Fix a possible resource leak in icom_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit d703d912a985c1c5b50dd38c3181fc3540fa77cb. For more details please see the references link.
